sentence.Network_en: Students often travel hundreds of miles to get here.
sentence.Network_cn: 学生常常赶数百英里的路来到这里。

sentence.Network_en: Hundreds of tightly rolled newspapers were set aflame among the 50,000 crowd.
sentence.Network_cn: 几百张卷紧的报纸在为数5万的人群中被点燃。

sentence.Network_en: The temperature in the south will soar into the hundreds.
sentence.Network_cn: 南方的温度会上升到一百多度。

they have recordson hundreds of patients ., 他们记录了数百个病人的资料.

entry.def: A hundred or one hundred is the number 100.

example.ex: According to one official more than a hundred people have been arrested.
example.tran: 一名官员称有一百多人被捕。

entry.def: If you refer to hundreds of things or people, you are emphasizing that there are very many of them.

example.ex: Hundreds of tree species face extinction...
example.tran: 许许多多树种濒临灭绝。

example.ex: Today you can buy hundreds of flavours of ice-cream.
example.tran: 如今你可以买到很多种口味的冰激凌。

entry.def: You can use a hundred per cent or one hundred per cent to emphasize that you agree completely with something or that it is completely right or wrong.

example.ex: Are you a hundred per cent sure it's your neighbour?...
example.tran: 你百分之百肯定是你的邻居吗？

example.ex: I agree with you one hundred per cent.

auth_sentence.content: Hundreds of millions of people pay them every month.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hundreds of millions of people pay them every month.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hundreds of millions of people pay them every month.

auth_sentence.content: There are literally hundreds of things you can measure.
auth_sentence.res_content: There are literally hundreds of things you can measure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There are literally hundreds of things you can measure.

auth_sentence.content: Hundreds and hundreds and hundreds of millions of them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hundreds and hundreds and hundreds of millions of them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hundreds and hundreds and hundreds of millions of them.

Sentence.sentence: They're also expensive, especially when you factor in the average college student's limited budget, typically costing hundreds of dollars every semester.
The biggest problem with traditional print textbooks is that they cost hundreds of dollars every semester.
they cost hundreds of dollars every semester.
Technology has cut out much of life's donkey work, and we have more freedoms than ever: we can wear what we like and communicate with hundreds of friends at once at the click of a mouse.
This exploitation has reached such extremes that presently it appears that some hundreds of thousands of species will be extinguished before the end of the century.
